scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp src/mock/mockPrivate.key dist/mock/mockPrivate.key
scripts.start: NODE_PATH=dist/ NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=../ node -r dotenv-flow/config dist/index.js
scripts.start:dev: LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=test DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=../ nodemon --watch ./src --ext ts -- --files -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.start:mock: LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_PATH=dist/ NODE_ENV=test DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=../ MOCK_AUTH_PORT=30658 MOCK_GRPC_PORT=50051 nodemon --watch ./src --ext ts -- --files -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/mock/index.ts
scripts.mock-and-start: npm run start:dev & npm run start:mock
